scripts.test:tapjs: cd packages/tapjs && npm run test -s || exit 0
scripts.test:tapjs-parallel: cd packages/tapjs && npm run test:better -s || exit 0
scripts.test:tapjs-serial: cd packages/tapjs && npm run test:inline -s || exit 0
scripts.test:ben-windows: pnpm run serve && hyperfine.exe --warmup 1 --runs 2 --export-json result.json "pnpm run test:jasmine" "pnpm run test:jasmine-parallel" "pnpm run test:jest" "pnpm run test:jest-parallel" "pnpm run test:jest-serial" "pnpm run test:vitest" "pnpm run test:vitest-parallel" "pnpm run test:vitest-forks" "pnpm run test:vitest-serial" "pnpm run test:vitest-no-isolate" "pnpm run test:mocha" "pnpm run test:mocha-parallel" "pnpm run test:qunit" "pnpm run test:ava" "pnpm run test:ava-serial" "pnpm run test:tape" "pnpm run test:tapjs" "pnpm run test:tapjs-parallel" "pnpm run test:tapjs-serial" "pnpm run test:uvu"
scripts.test:ben-linux: pnpm run serve && hyperfine --warmup 1 --runs 2 --export-json result.json 'pnpm run test:jasmine' 'pnpm run test:jasmine-parallel' 'pnpm run test:jest' 'pnpm run test:jest-parallel' 'pnpm run test:vitest' 'pnpm run test:vitest-parallel' 'pnpm run test:vitest-forks' 'pnpm run test:vitest-no-isolate' 'pnpm run test:mocha' 'pnpm run test:mocha-parallel' 'pnpm run test:qunit' 'pnpm run test:ava' 'pnpm run test:tape' 'pnpm run test:tapjs' 'pnpm run test:tapjs-parallel' 'pnpm run test:uvu'
